meta.property: One Hundred Sixteenth Congress of the United States of America
To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 770 Ayrault Road in Fairport, New York, as the “Louise and Bob Slaughter Post Office”.

main.name: HR540

content.p: To designate the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 770 Ayrault Road in Fairport, New York, as the “Louise and Bob Slaughter Post Office”.

main.enactingFormula: Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the United States of America in Congress assembled,

section.heading: Louise and Bob Slaughter Post Office.

subsection.heading: Designation.—
subsection.content: The facility of the United States Postal Service located at 770 Ayrault Road in Fairport, New York, shall be known and designated as the “Louise and Bob Slaughter Post Office”.

subsection.heading: References.—
subsection.content: Any reference in a law, map, regulation, document, paper, or other record of the United States to the facility referred to in subsection (a) shall be deemed to be a reference to the “Louise and Bob Slaughter Post Office”.

signature.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives.
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate.
